name: The Chronicles of The Amethyst Mage
name_original: The Chronicles of The Amethyst Mage
description:
My Team Entry for the Level Up Circle Jam's

Theme:

Foreign Entity 

(Something that doesn’t normally belong)

Big thank you to ademdj12 for the level design and sharsharshar843 for the music!

~ Description

From the endless ocean of the astral realm, metal monstrosities come. Bent on destruction,

Their hunger is all-consuming.

Their rage unending.

Their true purpose unknown.

But what is known is that they must be stopped before they devour all that is left in our magical realm.

It will take a true hero with power and wisdom, a righteous warrior to defend the land from the Unknown entities..... unfortunately, they died.... and now all we have is you.
